info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 6:38PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Morrow and central Gilliam Counties through 715 PM PDT... At 638 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles east of Olex, or 18 miles northeast of Condon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ione. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
